text: (Noyan) De hele Karabey, neymiş bu mühim mesele?
english: (Noise) So Karabey, what's the big deal?

text: Sultan Alaeddin, Ertokuş isimli bir casusunu bölgeye gönderdi.
english: Sultan Alaeddin has sent a spy named Ertokuş to the region.

text: Bahar ayında sizin üzerinize yapacağı sefer için bilgi topluyor.
english: He's gathering information for his expedition to you in the spring.

text: (Noyan) Saadettin Köpek'e bu bilgiden dolayı şükranlarımı sunasın.
english: (Noise) You're gonna have to thank the Dog for this information.

text: Ertokuş isimli bir hain. Ölmeyecek. Canlı isterim.
english: A traitor named Morrow, he's not going to die.

text: Ha bu arada Abdurrahman Alp'i de yanına alasın.
english: And by the way, let Abdurrahman take the Alps with him.

text: Lakin bir hainlik eylerse, ben seni bilirim.
english: But if he does, I know you.
He sent the silver to the Alps, extended the deal.

text: Alplerini yollayıp, Goncagül'ü kervansaraydan almanı istedi.
english: He sent his alps and asked you to pick up Goncagul from the caravan.
I know, the roads are very dangerous.

text: Goncagül bacımı ben alıp gelirim ana.
english: I'll pick up my goncagul sister, mother.
We'll be back before the day's over.

text: Dönün ki daha sana Gökçe'yi isteyeceğiz.
english: Come back, we'll ask you for the Skyman.
What's the wind that got you here?
I'm going to visit my aunt Aytolun.

text: Kızım, dün akşam seninle pek konuşamadık.
english: My daughter, we didn't talk much to you last night.

text: Hayme Ana'm, takdir edersin ki çok ani oldu.
english: Hey, Mom, you'll appreciate it was so sudden.
The best is yet to come.

text: ...Ertuğrul'un da bu konuyla ilgili fikrini merak ederim.
english: I wonder what Ertugrul thinks about this.

text: Şimdi burayı akşam misafirlerimiz için sana layık bir hale getirmek isterim.
english: Now I'd like to make this place worthy of you for our evening guests.
(Goncagul) Let go! I said let go!
If you're the dog that's down...
Do you know who you're attacking?

text: Kapa çeneni. Yoksa kanını dökerim senin.
english: Shut up or I'll shed your blood.
We found it on the ground looking in the sky.
Let's see what the Dodurga's got.

text: Gel. Gel de seninle olan hesabımızı görelim.
english: Come on, let's see what we have with you.

text: Tuğtekin ağabeyim tam vaktinde geldi hala.
english: My brick brother still came in just in time.
If he was a little late...
Come on, Gonca, it's too late.

text: Başlarında da Hamza ve Abdurrahman denen o soysuzlar vardı.
english: And they had Hamza and Abdurrahman, the descendants of the unknown.

text: Evlat, onun da mı canını kurtardın?
english: Son, did you save her life too?
You should have invited me to the room.

text: Evvel Hayme halanın otağına gitmek istedi.
english: First, Hayme wanted to go to the master's room.

text: Hayatlarını kurtarmama rağmen onun otağına gitti.
english: He went to his room even though I saved their lives.

text: Bu otağa, senin yanına gelmedi baba.
english: He didn't come to this room, Dad.

text: Moğol saldırısında yitip giden canlarınız için…
english: For your lives lost in the Mongol invasion...

text: …ne kadar üzgün olduğumuzu bilmenizi isteriz Hayme Ana.
english: We want you to know how sorry we are, Mother.

text: Sultan Alaeddin bizzat size gelerek taziyelerini sunmamı emretti.
english: Sultan Alaeddin himself ordered me to come to you and offer my condolences.

text: Lakin sadece bir felaket size Moğolların elinden gelmiş.
english: But only one disaster has come to you from the Mongols.

text: İkinci felakete de bizzat siz sebebiyet vermişsiniz.
english: You're the cause of the second disaster.
To take the post of Ertuğrul and deport him...

text: Ertuğrul Bey’le çok önemli bir mesele hakkında görüşmek isterim.
english: I would like to speak to Ertuğrul Bey about a very important matter.
If you're going to see her...

text: Ertokuş Bey seni görmek istediğini söylemiş Hayme Ana’ya.
english: The next day, Mr. Hayme Anaya said he wanted to see you.

text: Deli Demir ile Artuk Bey sana haber etmemi istedi.
english: Mad Iron and Mr. Artuk asked me to let you know.
No one should see me talking to her.

text: Doğru dersin de nasıl olacak bu beyim?

english: He's leaving with his troops early in the morning.

text: Şimdi beni iyi dinle Doğan. Ertokuş Bey’e git de ki…
english: Now listen to me, Dagan, and tell Mr. Tomorrow that...

text: …Ertuğrul Bey bu gece oba yakınlarında seninle buluşacakmış de.
english: ...that Mr. Ertugrul will meet you near the village tonight.
I heard you were calling me.

text: Dünya gözüyle seni gördüm ya, bu bana yeter.
english: I've seen you through the eyes of the world, that's enough for me.
I heard you were calling me.

text: Dünya gözüyle seni gördüm ya, bu bana yeter.
english: I've seen you through the eyes of the world, that's enough for me.
(Sighs) What are the airports in Konya?

text: (Ertuğrul) Sultan, Moğol eşkıyası hakkında ne düşünür?
english: (Ertogrul) What does the Sultan think about the Mongol conquest?
After winter, the Hudute will be evacuated...
...and the next time, the preparations will be launched.

text: Evvel beni gönderdi. Tüm civar boyları, bölgeleri dolaşırım.
english: He sent me first, I'll walk the whole neighborhood.

text: Edindiğim bilgileri bir bir kendisine diyeceğim.
english: I'll tell each of them what I know.

text: Bu halinle Noyan’a savaş açmaya kalktığını duydum.
english: I hear you're trying to start a war on Noah with this attitude.

text: Nice azlar, nice çoklara galip gelmiştir cenk meydanında.
english: How few, how many have prevailed in the battlefield.
My weakness is my greatest strength.

text: Noyan benden bir hareket beklemez gayrı.
english: Noyan doesn't expect me to make a move.

text: Onu hiç beklemediği bir anda vuracağım.
english: I'm gonna shoot him at a moment he never expected.
How many men will you fight against Noyan?

text: Bamsı da geldiğinde dört kişi olacağız.
english: And when the bomb comes, we'll be four.
(Eroquois) I don't know what's going on in your head.

text: Lakin çolak eline rağmen söylediğini yapacağına eminim.
english: But I'm sure you'll do what you say, despite your hand in the chocolates.
What does Noyan want from you?

text: Ben de seninle bu meseleyi konuşmak isterim.
english: I'd like to talk to you about that.
(Erthous) We put a spy next to Oegeda.
He's been working for us for years.

text: Bir casus olduğunu bilirlerdi. Lakin kim olduğunu bilmezlerdi.
english: They knew he was a spy, but they didn't know who he was.
Now they'll have a moment to learn.
What's this got to do with me?
Because that spy is your brother.
I'm not sure Sungur Tekin is alive.

text: …Noyan’ın söylediği gibi hain olmadığına da çok sevindim.
english: I'm glad that he's not a traitor, as Noyan said.
If my mother hears that, she'll be born again.
You'll never tell anyone what I told you.

text: Noyan beni bu yüzden yakalayıp, konuşturmak derdinde.
english: Noyan's been trying to catch me and make me talk.

text: Hem casusun kim olduğunu bilmek ister…
english: And he wants to know who the spy is...

text: …hem de Selçuklu’nun ordusunun bazı gizli bilgilerini.
english: ...and some secret information from the Seljuk army.

text: Yarın Tandır Tepesi’nin dibindeki kuytuya gel.
english: Tomorrow, come to the well at the bottom of Tandan Hill.

text: Bana bir şey olursa, kardeşine nasıl ulaşacağını sana göstereceğim.
english: If anything happens to me, I'll show you how to reach your brother.

text: Bu sırrı senden başka kimse bilmeyecek.
english: No one will know this secret except you.

text: Merak etmeyesin. Yarın istediğin yerde olacağım.
english: Don't worry, I'll be where you want me tomorrow.

text: Yüce Allah her şeyi gören ve bilendir.
english: And Allah is the All-seeing, the All-knowing.

text: Kayıların bu zor gününde Dodurgalı kardeşlerinin yanına gelmesi…
english: The fact that the boats came to see their Dodurgal brothers on this difficult day...
...how he has raised and strengthened us...

text: …bu ortaklıktan daha çok hayırlar çıkacağına inanırım.
english: I believe there will be more good out of this partnership.
...in the way that this is all-consuming...
...which will open new doors for us by God's grace.
...by the command of God, by the people of our Prophet...
...we came to ask for our daughter Skyche.

text: Her şeyden evvel, Dodurga Beyi’nin otağımıza lütfedip gelip…
english: First of all, the Doddurg brain would come to our room and...

text: …oğluna kızımız Gökçe’yi istemesi, ben ve Kayılar için büyük bir şereftir.
english: ...to ask our son for our daughter Heaven, it's a great honor for Kays and me.
My life with my King Solomon...

text: …çok şükür ki böyle güzel ve saadetli anlar tadabildik.
english: ...thankfully we were able to enjoy such happy moments.
...it was sunrise and my bride was Seljan's crew.

text: Yüce Allah, Tuğtekin ve Gökçe evlatlarımıza da…
english: And God Almighty, and our sons of the Eagle and the Skybird...
I'm going to be a little late.
I'm going to be a little late.
I'm going to be a little late.
I'll get the liquor I've cooled out.

text: Biliyorum, hemen gideceksin. Lakin bilmeni istediğim bir şey var.
english: I know you're leaving right now, but I want you to know something.

text: Korkut Bey, oğlu Tuğtekin’e istemeye geldiler beni.
english: Mr. Coward, they came to ask for my son, Tugtekin.

text: Buna en çok ben sevindim, bilesin.
english: I'm the one who's happy about this, you know.

text: Mutlu olduğunu görmeyi herkesten çok isterim.
english: I'd love to see you happy more than anyone.

text: Seni gönlümden atacağımı sanırsın değil mi?
english: You think I'm gonna throw you out of my mind, don't you?
How many times have we talked?

text: Yeterince canımız yanmakta. Bir de sen…
Merak etmeyesin. Seni gördüğümü kimseye demem.
english: Don't worry, I won't tell anyone I saw you.

text: Bir yuvanız olsun. Evlatların, gelecekle ilgili hayallerin olsun.
english: Have a home, your children, your dreams for the future.

text: İnşallah sen de büyüyünce yürekli bir Alp olacaksın.
english: I hope you'll be a brave Alpine when you grow up.

text: Alpler, Ertokuş Bey yarın sabah erkenden…
english: Alps, Mr. Tomorrow, in the early morning...

text: Siz de benimle Tandır Tepesi’nde buluşacaksınız.
english: You will meet me on the Hill of the Mountain.
You're the one who orders it, sir.

text: …bu şekilde obana gelmen benim çok gücüme gider.
english: ...you're going to be very strong to come to your village like this.

text: Çok şükür en azından gelecek bir obamız var Turgut Alp.
english: Thank God we have at least one future village in the Turgut Alps.

text: Ne olacak bu işin sonu Turgut kardeş?
english: What will happen to this, Brother Turgut?

text: Ne vakit pusatımın çeliğine düşmanımın aksi düşer…
english: When my enemy falls on the steel of my hub...

text: Gözümün görmediği, pusatımın kesmediği düşmanım içimizdeyse…
english: If we have an enemy that my eye cannot see, my heart cannot cut...

text: Obaya tekinsiz biri girdi diye evham yapmış Alpler.
english: Alpler suggested that someone entered the building unpaid.

text: Buralarda gölgesini gördük dediler. Sizin için endişe ettim.
english: They said we saw your shadow around here.

text: Lakin gelseydi, çoktan ayağının dibinde olurdu kellesi.
english: But if he did, he'd be dead by now.

text: Biz de seninle gelelim istersen kardeş.
english: We can come with you, brother.
Oh, my God, we'll take care of it.

text: Gökçe kızım. Ben de, ağabeyin de, Halime Sultan da…
english: I'm your daughter, and your brother and Halime Sultan...
...we were honored by Mr. Coward's offer.
Of course I'll have the last word.
But this excitement we've been having...
I'd like to hear it from you.
Even though the grass is a tourist...

text: Tuğtekin gibi bir beyin hanımı olmak…
english: Being a brain lady like a brick...

text: …benim için büyük bir şereftir Hayme Ana.
english: ...it is a great honor for me, Mother Earth.

text: Ben de ömür boyu bu şerefi taşımak isterim.
english: I'd like to carry that honor for the rest of my life.
...to be able to bring happiness to his descendants.
If they thought I deserved it...

text: (Artuk iç ses) Devletler kurup, devler yıkanlara.
english: (Laughter) For those who build states and destroy giants.

text: (Artuk iç ses) Ertuğrul kardeşinin yaşadığını öğrendi.
english: (Shouting) Ertuğrul found out his brother was alive.

text: (Artuk iç ses) Dodurga Obası’nda işler daha da karmaşık hale geldi.
english: (Laughter) Things got more complicated in the Dordurga Room.

text: (Artuk iç ses) Ertuğrul, bütün zorluklara rağmen…
…pes etmeden mücadeleye devam ediyor. Gözüm her daim üzerinde olacaktır.
english: I'll keep my eye on you.
I'm the Lord of the Flies.

text: Hoş geldin beyim. Gece gece hayırdır inşallah.
english: Welcome, sir, I hope not at night.
No, no, no, I'm not going to.

text: Evvela Abdurrahman’ı kurtarmamda bana yardımcı olduğun için…
english: For helping me save Abdurrahman first...
As long as you're walking in justice...
...you will always have servants to help you, sir.

text: Lakin daha önemli bir meselemiz vardır.
english: But we have a more important issue.

text: Obadaki haini bir an önce bulmamız gerekir Artuk Bey.
english: We must find the traitor in the village immediately, Mr. Artuk.

text: Hainler hiç bitmez beyim. Hiç de bitmeyecektir.

english: What do you mean, "I'm not a doctor"?
So if we're saying stop the Mongols...
If you want to light the fire of the resurrection...

text: …Semerkant’ı, Buhara’yı ve dahi Kudüs’ü rüyalarına ortak eylemelisin beyim.
english: ...you must share the dreams of Semerkanthi, Bukhara and even Jerusalem, sir.

text: Lakin eğer diriliş ateşini harlamak istiyorsak…
english: But if we want to start the fire of the resurrection...
...and the traitors must be burned in that fire.
Let us burn the traitors in that fire...
...the power of our fire will increase.

text: Beyimi gündüz gözüyle bir daha ne zaman göreceğim?
english: When will I see my master again in broad daylight?

text: Her karanlık gecenin bir nurlu sabahı vardır Artuk Bey.
english: Every dark night has a bright morning, Mr. Artuk.

text: Gece sırları örtendir. Gündüz sırlar ifşa olur.
english: He who conceals the secrets of the night, and reveals them by day.
There's always a secret to your secrets.

text: Bana müsaade Artuk Bey. Gözünü dört açasın.
english: Allow me to see you, Mr. Artuk.

text: Şu obadaki haini bir an önce bulalım.
english: Let's find the traitor in that village right now.

text: Gün olur, bütün hainler ifşa olur.
english: The day will come when all traitors will be exposed.

text: İnşallah düğününüzü de tez vakitte yaparız kızım.
english: I hope we can have your wedding soon, girl.

text: İki genç birbirlerine çok yakıştılar Korkut Bey’im.
english: Two young men are very good together, Mr. Coward.
God bless you in a pillow.

text: Keşke ablan da burada olup görseydi.
english: I wish your sister was here too.
I pray to God for his immediate recovery.
...now I have two children, Mr. Coward.

text: Benim de gayrı bir kız evladım oldu.
Orada benim gibi onları gizlice dinleyen biri daha.
english: There's someone else out there who's listening to them in secret like me.
I couldn't see who you were.

text: O vakit kimin adına çalışıyor bu adam?
english: Then whose name is this guy working for?

text: Obada bilmediğimiz başka şeyler dönüyor Efrasiyab.
english: There's other things going on in the abbey we don't know about, Efrasiyab.
When you go, talk to Noyan about these things.

text: Bir de ona iyi bir hediyem olduğunu söylersin.
english: And you tell him I have a good present.

text: Ertuğrul ile Atabey Ertokuş. İkisi gizlice bir yerde buluşacak.
english: Ertuğrul and Atabey Ertuğrul will meet somewhere secretly.
It's on the top of the hill.

text: Gayrı Noyan’a düşen ikisinin kellesini almaktır.
english: The only thing wrong is to take the heads of the two who fall to Noah.

text: Keşke bu mutlu günümüzde Ertuğrul da yanımızda olaydı.
english: I wish Ertuğrul was with us on this happy day.
I hope he comes to our wedding, Mother.

text: …Selcan’la bir kere daha konuşmak ister misin?
english: ...do you want to talk to Selcan again?

text: İstemem ana. Ben diyeceğimi dedim. Bitti.
english: I said I'd tell you, it's over.

text: Beyim, pusatın yeni avlara mı bilenir?
english: Sir, does your hub know about new hunting?

text: Pusatım elime tutuştuğu günden beri hiç avsız kalmadı ki.
english: I've never been uncomfortable since the day I got my gun.

text: Lakin pusatın çevresi bugün başka parlamaktadır.
english: But the center's surroundings are shining differently today.

text: Sanki bir acıya merhem olacak gibi…

english: ...like being an ambassador in a vacuum.

text: Hem de nice hasrete derman olacaktır. Öyle bir acıyı dindirecek ki…
english: And it will cure you of many sorrows, and it will relieve you of such pain that...
...the day will come again for my mother Hayme.

text: Yıllardır hasretle beklediğimiz kardeşim Sungur Tekin’e kavuşmamıza ramak kaldı.
english: We've been waiting for years to meet my brother Sungur Tekin.
...the one who silences my word is a victim, my son.

text: Pusatın var olsun, kudretin bol olsun beyim.
english: Have a seat, have plenty of power, sir.
I wish you had an eye on every tree trunk.
Don't look me in the eye, sir.
You have to look into this place.
(Tangles) These are the words of Ephraim.

text: Kocabaş, Ertuğrul’u öldürmeyerek akıllıca bir iş yapmış.
english: Big Head did a smart job not killing Ertuğrul.
He shot two birds with a rock.

text: Hem Oğuz boylarının en iyi Alp’ini…
english: And the best Alpini of Son's height...

text: …hem de Selçuklu ordusunun en iyi komutanını elime geçireceğim.
english: ...and I will take over the best commander of the Seljuk army.
The conia will be shaken by this vile murder.
Keep your way clear, Atabey Ertoush.
...to try to lure political passions into the palace...

text: …Sultan Alaeddin’in himmetinden pay kapmaya çalışanlar çok olur.
english: ...there are many who try to take a share in the Sultan's charity.
Don't let him go after his passions.

text: …Konya Sarayı’nın odalarında iş tutmayasın Korkut Bey.
english: ...you must not work in the rooms of Conya Palace, Mr. Coward.

text: Sen ne demek istersin Atabey Ertokuş?
english: What do you mean, Atabey Ertoush?
Saadettin's been a whore around the dog.

text: Sarayda senin neyin peşinde olduğunu bilmeyen yoktur.
english: No one in the palace knows what you're after.
You have a headache, you know that.
We are here for our country, for our Sultan...

text: Sen bunları bilmezmiş gibi gelip burada babamı tehdit edersin Atabey Ertokuş.
english: You come here and threaten my father like you don't know anything about it, Atabey Ertoush.

text: Şimdiden oğlun Tuğtekin bu zehirden nasibini almıştır Korkut Bey.
english: Your son has already taken his share of the poison, Mr. Coward.

text: Gözümüzün içine baka baka seni tehdit eder beyim.
english: Looking into our eyes, sir, threatens you.

text: Sultan Alaeddin, istediğim uç beyliğini bana vermeyecek hatun.
english: Sultan Alaeddin, the girl who won't give me the extreme brain I want.
They think the sultan is the ruler of the state.

text: Bilesin ki böyle düşünenler her vakit yanılmıştır beyim.
english: You know, those who think that are always wrong, sir.
You said it was a dog, Mom?

text: Saadettin Köpek gibi nice devlet adamlarının gücüdür…
english: Saadettin's power is the power of many statesmen like the Dog...

text: Takdir edersin ki bunu en iyi ağabeyim Gümüştekin bilir.
english: You'll appreciate my best brother, Silverkin, knows that.

text: Bunca vakittir Konya’da senin için, obamız için ter döker durur.
english: He's been sweating for you, for our village, all this time in Konya.
He won't come back until he gets what he wants.

text: Gündoğdu'mla evleneceğim gün pek bir sevinmiştim.
english: I was so happy the day I married my sunrise.
The dome fell on my head.

text: Şer bildiğimiz her şeyde mutlaka bir hayır vardır Selcan.
english: There's always a good thing in everything we know to be evil, Selcan.

text: Bu şerdeki tek hayır senin için olacak Halime.
english: The only no in this world will be for you, Halime.
The storm in the heart of the sky is not calm, I know.
...who would like to be my mistress.

text: Gündoğdu Bey'imin öfkesi dindiği vakit siz de bir araya geleceksiniz.
english: When the wrath of the Lord of the East is rested, you will gather.
(Selcan) There are big gaps between us.
...the eyes of the sunrise are not as good as they used to be.
...maybe to the heart of my master...
...and fall in love with another man.

text: Demek Ögeday'ın yanındaki casus Sungur Tekin yani.
english: So, the spy with Ogeday is Sungur Tekin.
He's been cheating on us all these years, hasn't he?
All the sons of Suleiman Shah will die.
...when he finds out who the case is...

text: ...Sungur Tekin denen iti Ögeday'ın yanına ben soktum.
english: I put the dog Sungur Tekin next to Ogeday.
I'm obviously gonna pull the lights on.
Ogeday will ask me to account for this.

text: Bu Kayılar benim hayatımı çok zorlaştırdı Ulu Bilge.
english: These boulders have made my life very difficult, Great Wisdom.

text: Demek ki dünyayı onlara cehenneme çevireceğim.
english: So I'm gonna make the world a living hell for them.
We need to get this information out now.
Oegeday is about to take down China.
He's counting on time to come to Anatolia.
You can be, Mr. Sungur Tekin.
I hope I don't see your family...

text: Ben de burada adamlarımla kalıp Ertuğrul'u halledeceğim.
english: I'll stay here with my men and deal with Ertuğrul.
The cows will pay the price for this betrayal.
We meet again, are we, Ertuğrul?
There is no escape from Ertuğrul.
How did you find this place?
There's a traitor in the mansion.
(Hamza) I told you to throw your sword.

text: Sakın unutma, Noyan onu diri istiyor.
english: Don't forget, Noyan wants him alive.
You're gonna pay the price for this.
He ran off with that unruly horse, sir.

text: Belli ki Atabey Ertokuş'u Savdur'a götürdüler.
english: It's obvious that Atabey Ertoush was taken to Savdur.

text: Hamza ile hain Alpler yaptı bu işi.
english: Hamza and the traitor Alpler did this.

text: Dün gece bizi takip etmiş olmalılar.
english: They must have followed us last night.

text: (Tuğtekin) Dün gece ömrümün en güzel gecesiydi.
english: (Sighs) Last night was the best night of my life.

text: Hele babamla anama söylediğin o sözler.
english: Especially those words you said to my parents.

text: Gayri bir ömür nakış gibi gönlümü kazımıştır.
english: A lifetime of unknown embroidery has pierced my heart.
...every time you look me in the eye, I see the goodness in your heart.
If you hold your hand fast...

text: Bu kadar emin misin Gündoğdu'nun beni istediğinden?
english: Are you so sure Sunrise wants me?

text: İçi çöl gibi kurumuş o avratla bunca seneyi geçirdikten sonra...
english: After all these years of living in that dry desert...

text: ...senin gençliğin ve güzelliğin Gündoğdu'nun başını döndürecektir.
english: ...your youth and beauty will turn the head of the Sunrise.

text: Dün gece bakışlarını alamadı senden. Görmedin mi?
english: He didn't get your looks last night.

text: Selcan Hatun'la döşekleri ayırdıkları doğru mudur?
english: Is it true that Selcan and Hatun are beds apart?
If it wasn't for Big Head, the Sunrise would be a killer.
He was gonna cut Selcan's head off.

text: O arsız avradı zor aldı elinden.
english: He barely got that assless European out of his hand.

text: Ben Selcan'ın yerinde olaydım çoktan başımı alır giderdim.
english: I'd be out of here by now if I were Selcan.

text: Adamın yakasından düşmemek için her şeyi yapacaktır.
english: She'll do anything to keep him from falling over.
You know, my job is hard.
What am I supposed to do?

text: Göreceksin bak arkası çorap söküğü gibi gelecektir.
english: You'll see it comes out like a back sock.
I still don't give my best.
Since we're going to subject the records to our own...

text: ...madem büyüyüp hak ettiğimiz uç beyliğini alacağız...
english: ...as we grow up and get the brains we deserve...
I'll do what I have to do.

text: Yalnız bu işi kendi bildiğim yolla yapacağım hala.
english: I'm just gonna do it my way.

text: Hayme de, Halime de uzak durur.
english: He's not going to be with me.
If we go your way, we'll lose.
How are you going to approach them?

text: Beyim, bundan ötesi ferah bir yol değildir.
english: Sir, that's not a comfortable way to go.
Everywhere is full of Noyan's soldiers.
I say we wait for Abdurrahman in my pauper's house.
Have a good day, the sky woman.

text: Dün gece o kadar çok düşündüm ki Gökçe.
english: I thought so much last night, Skyfall.

text: Bunca vakit Konya'da sarayda babanla birlikte yaşadın dedim.
english: I said you lived with your father at the palace in Konya all this time.

text: Ya bu oba hayatını için kaldırmazsa...
english: What if this village doesn't give up on her life...

text: ...ya ayağın geri geri giderse diye o kadar çok korktum ki.
english: I was so afraid that your foot would fall back.
But it didn't happen, you know?

text: (Goncagül) Senin gibi akrabalarım olduğunu gördüğümde cesaret geldi.
english: (Goncagul) It was encouraging to see that I had relatives like you.
Welcome to the family, Sky Girl.

text: Allah sana Tuğtekin gibi bir bey nasip etsin Goncagül.
english: God bless you with a gentleman like Tugtekin, Goncagul.
What is it like at the palace, Goncagul?

text: Ta ki bir düşmanın gelip seni sırtından hançerleyene kadar.
english: Until an enemy comes and stabs you in the back.

text: Bizim obadan pek de bir farkı yok desene.
english: It's not much different from our village.
I'm glad you thought so, Selcan.

text: Herkes için en doğrusu bu kızım.
english: This is my daughter, for everyone.
I brought you presents from Konya.

text: Sizi seven, sayan babamla birlikte kendi ellerimizle seçtik.
english: We chose you with our own hands, along with my father who loved and respected you.

text: Bunlar da Halime Sultan'la Ertuğrul Bey'imin bebelerine.
english: These are for the babies of Halime Sultan and my lord Ertuğrul.

text: Bu hediyeleri Ertuğrul Bey'im adına almaktan da onur duydum.
english: I'm also honoured to receive these gifts for my lord Ertuğrul.
He's sorry about what's going on with Ertuğrul.
I don't know what to say.

text: Bu hediyelerle hepimizi çok mutlu ettin kızım.
english: You've made us all so happy with these gifts, my daughter.
If I have grieved the Sultan of Halime...
No, it has nothing to do with you.
You're part of the family now.

text: İyi günde, kötü günde kader ortaklığı ettik.
english: We shared fate on good days and bad days.
Because I have relatives like you...
After the happiness we had last night...
How many days left on the road?
We'll be there one day, sir.
You've been my companion for all these years.

text: Yolda olmak nedir, yoldaşlık nedir bilir misin?
english: Do you know what it's like to be on the road, what it's like to be in a company?

text: Sıratı Müstakim de olmak demektir evladım.
english: It's time to be a Successor, son.
I mean, it's about being on the right track.
...if we ask the Lord for help...
...it means we're on the right track.
For the glory, for the fame...
...if we walk for the oppression, we'll get out of the way.
May Allah not make us a people of transgressors.

text: Eğer yoldan çıkarsak işte bu hale düşeriz.
english: If we get out of the way, that's what we're gonna be.
You've lost a lot of blood.
So you're not on the right track.

text: Karşımıza ne eşkıya, ne zalim çıktı.
english: He was neither cruel nor cruel to us.
...if you're not going the right way...
Where are you coming from, where are you going?
We'll go to Hu from Hayy.

text: Zaten halin yok, zulüm etme kendine.
english: You're not in a good mood, so don't hurt yourself.
He's got to be on his way.
I will never forget your kindness.
(Ibn-i-Arabi) O Allah, I have been given the power to make you a slave.

text: Efendim, böyle gitmesine neden müsaade ettik?
english: Sir, why did we let it go like this?

text: Onda bize ait bir emanet var.
english: He has a trust that belongs to us.
I hope he brings her to us.

text: Obamıza bir nebze de olsa huzur geldi.
english: Our Obama has a little peace.
My peace will be shaken, brother.

text: Ertuğrul'un nerede olduğunu Alplerinden başka bilen yok.
english: Nobody knows where Ertuğrul is except the Alps.
They won't tell you if you kill them.

text: Anlaşılan obaya zarar vermemek için Ertuğrul geri gelmiyor.
english: It seems Ertuğrul is not coming back to avoid damaging the village.
I hope we don't get into any more trouble.
I'm calling it the "Snowflake" with the brick.
This wedding will refresh, clean up our village.
...when peace has returned to the room...

text: Bu kefereler bizim peşimizi niye bırakmaz diye gülerim beyim.
english: I'm laughing at why these assholes don't just come after us, sir.

text: ...yoksa biz mi keferelerin yuvasına çomak sokarız...
english: ...or we'll put the shit in the cockroaches' nest...
...how the dagger cut us with its axe...

text: ...Doğan kuş olup bizi nasıl avladı diye.
english: ...how the bird came to hunt us.

text: Bamsı burada olsaydı hızını alamazdı beyim.
english: If the lady was here, she wouldn't be able to keep up, sir.

text: Ben cehenneme gideceğim, onları orada bir güzel pataklayacağım derdi.
english: He said I'd go to hell, beat them up.

text: Onları pataklayabilmek için cehenneme bile giderdi.
english: He would go to hell to beat them up.

text: Bamsı kardeşi de özledik gayri be.

english: What have you done without me?
Even if he comes with a good one.
The traitor in the village is very much a pain in the ass.
We're not comfortable without finding him.

text: İki obanın kaynaşması için büyük bir adım attık Aytolun.
english: We've taken a big step towards the merger of the two cities, Aytolun.
Two young men who loved each other, sir.

text: Hayırlı bir iş ki bize de vesile olmak nasip oldu.
english: It's a good job that we're lucky to have.

text: İnşallah arkası da istediğin gibi gelir beyim.
english: I hope the back comes as you wish, sir.
When the time comes, two villages...

text: Hele ki sen şu uç beyliğini al.
english: Especially if you take that extreme brain.

text: Sultan Alaeddin'i ikna etmek hiç de kolay olmayacak.
english: It will not be easy to convince Sultan Alaeddin.
You have to be patient, sir.
...before I bring you what you want...
What would I do without you?

text: Ben senin her daim yanında olacağım.
english: I'll always be there for you.

text: Ya bedenime saplanan o uğursuz bıçak yüzünden gebe kalamazsam?
english: What if I can't get pregnant because of that unfortunate knife stuck in my body?
What if I can't give my husband a baby?
That is the knowledge of Allah.
It's up to us to walk the straight path.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Mutlu olduğunu görmeyi herkesten çok isterim.
english: (External noise) I'd love to see you happy more than anyone.
We're both going to be fine, Sky.

text: (Gökçe iç ses) Bundan gayri bana ağlamak yok.
english: (Sighs) You can't cry for me other than that.

text: (Gökçe iç ses) Aşk acısı çekmek yok.
english: (Screaming) There is no pain in love.
(Screaming) The pain of love for them...
I hear you're interested in the business of our villages.

text: Bildiğiniz gibi beş senedir babamın işleri vesilesiyle Konya'daydım.
english: As you know, I've been in Konya for five years because of my father's business.
I read his letters, I wrote them.

text: Elimden geldiğince işlerinde yardımcı olmaya gayret gösterdim.
english: I tried to help them with their business as much as I could.
If you'd like to take advantage of my reading ability...

text: ...elimden geldiğince size de yardımcı olmak isterim. Bunu bilmenizi istedim.
english: I want you to know that I would like to help you as much as I can.

text: Bu arada biraz Farsça ve Rumca da bilirim.
english: I also speak a little Persian and Romanian.
What am I supposed to say?
The part is on a man's feet.

text: Senin gibi bir beye hizmet etmek...
english: To serve a gentleman like you...
...that will make me very happy, sir.
O Allah, forgive me, forgive me, I have no other choice.
If you'll excuse me, Toy is waiting for me.

text: Seninle bir mevzu hakkında konuşmak isterim.
english: I'd like to talk to you about something.
Since Tuckekin is going to marry my brother, Skywalker...

text: ...aramızdaki bu tatsızlığın bitmesinde fayda var derim.
english: I think it's worth it to put an end to this discomfort.

text: Sen hiç merak etme Selcan Hatun.
english: Don't worry about it, Selcan Hatun.

text: Halam da, sen de çok iyi insanlarsınız.
english: You and my aunt are very good people.

text: Bu evlilik hepimizi birbirimize bağlayacak, kavuşturacak.
english: This marriage will bind us all together, bring us together.

text: Bunları senden duydum ya, inan o kadar mutlu oldum ki.
english: I heard that from you, believe me, I'm so happy.
...Efrasiyab has seen all our goods one by one.
He remembers the animals in the herd.

text: Yahu hayvanları bile artık dişlerinden tanır.
english: Even the animals can recognize their teeth.

text: (Gündoğdu) Ee bizi de bizden iyi tanır.
english: (Easter) So he knows us better than we do.
He knows how we're a man of our word.
(Early) Let's do it, but on one condition.
...when the arms are moving, our animals...

text: Dediğin bence de doğrudur Gündoğdu Bey.
english: I think you're right, Mr. Sunrise.
When I see you in your city clothes...
Is Mr. Coward in his room?

text: Sizi bu kadar erken beklemiyorduk beyim.
english: We weren't expecting you this early, sir.
They're married to the gentlemen of the castle.
You sat down and talked the right thing.

text: Beyler, sizin bir diyeceğiniz var mı?
english: Gentlemen, do you have anything to say?
Well, then, good luck to all of us.

text: Sağ olasın, var olasın. Hayırlı olsun.

english: Welcome to the city, Mr. Silver.
The years have not changed you.
But I'm not here with good news.
Bring the silver to our lord.

text: (Gümüştekin) Her iki obanın da yiğit beyleri...
english: (Silver) The brave gentlemen of both sides...

text: ...bildiğiniz gibi üç senedir devletimizin isteği üzerine...
english: ...as you know, for three years, at the request of our state...
...I was an officer at the Conya Palace.

text: Korkut Bey'imin de izniyle obamdan kopup sultanın hizmetine girdim.
english: With the permission of my Lord Coward, I left my palace and entered the service of the sultan.
Of course, I'm honored by my job.

text: Hele ki Moğol keferesine karşı cenk ederken.
english: Especially when we're fighting the Mongol war.

text: (Gümüştekin) Çok şey gördüm, çok şey yaşadım.
english: (Silver) I've seen a lot, I've lived a lot.

text: Artık saraydaki vazifem bitti. Sultanın da emriyle...
english: Now my duty at the palace is over, and by order of the Sultan...

text: ...savaş gününe kadar obamda vazifelendirildim diye sevinip...
english: ...being glad to be assigned to my village until the day of the battle...
But never was such a lowly...

text: ...böylesine bir acı yaşayacağım hiç aklıma gelmezdi. Hiç!
english: I never thought I'd have such pain.

text: (Korkut) Ne oldu Gümüştekin Bey'im? Anlat hele.
Ertokuş Bey ve askerlerine yolda saldırmışlar.
english: The next day, the gentleman and his troops were attacked on the way.
What do you think, Mr. Silver?

text: Daha... Daha dün obadan sağ salim ayrılmışlardı.
english: They just... they left the village yesterday.

text: Saldırıdan sağ kurtulan bir asker Selçuklu karargahına gelerek bize olanları anlattı.
english: A soldier who survived the attack came to Selcuklu headquarters and told us what had happened.
I couldn't believe what I heard.

text: Gencecik delikanlıları hiç çekinmeden kılıçtan geçirmişler. Hiç!
english: They've killed the young boys with the sword, without a shadow of a doubt.

text: Ortada yok. Belli ki onu da kaçırmışlar.
english: He's not in the middle of it.

text: (Korkut) Bu alçaklığın müsebbibi kim? Moğollar mı?
english: (Fear) Who is the beneficiary of this humiliation?
I wish it were them, sir.

text: Keşke onlar olsaydı da şehadetlerine bakıp teselli olsaydık.
english: If only they were, and We could look at their testimonies and be comforted!

text: Konuşsana be adam! Lafı ağzında eveleyip, geveleyip durma.
english: Don't keep talking to me like that.

text: Haddini bil Gümüştekin! Orada biraz dur bakalım.
english: You're gonna have to be modest, Silverkin.

text: Benim oğlumun böyle bir alçaklığın içinde olduğunu söyleyen...
english: Whoever said my son was in such a low state...
I'll pay the price for his slander.
No, it's a lie, it's a lie.

text: Çok şükür otağ töresi de, devlet adabı da bize haddimizi öğretmiştir Hayme Ana.
english: Thankfully, the ceremony of the room and the state custom have taught us modesty.

text: O kurtulan asker Ertuğrul'u gördüğünü söyledi. Ben de inanamadım.
english: That survivor said he saw Ertuğrul.
Then I went and saw it with my own eyes.

text: Kayıların oklarını. Ölen Alplerini ve pusatlarını.
english: The arrows of the bows, the dead alps and the poles.

text: (Gümüştekin) Dilerseniz siz de gidin. Kendi gözlerinizle görün.
english: (And if you desire, then go and see for yourselves.)

text: Bize on iki Alp ihanet edip...

english: ...has passed into the ranks of Noyan.

text: Benim kardeşim katiyen böyle bir ihanetin içinde olamaz.
english: My brother, the butcher, could not be betrayed like that.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'imin yaptığını görmüş mü de iftira atar bu asker?
english: Did this soldier see what my lord Ertuğrul did and then he slanders?
He was walking around with his wounds.
The soldier was there telling me what he saw.

text: ...Sultan'ın pervanesi Saadettin Köpek Hazretleri de vardı.
english: ...the Sultan's pet Saadett had his dog lords.
The killing of Ertuğrul where he was seen.
I'm gonna find out the truth about this.

text: Oğlum belli ki bir iftiranın kurbanı olmak üzere.
english: My son is clearly about to be the victim of a smear.
Not any of the silver ones, mother.

text: (Gündoğdu) Alaeddin için vazife yapmış önemli bir komutan.
english: (Easter) A major commander who has been assigned to Alaeddin.
It's none of my business who he is, son.

text: Hiç kimse beni Ertuğrul'un bu cinayetleri işlediğine ikna edemez.
english: No one can convince me that Ertuğrul committed these murders.

text: Hele Ertokuş'u alacak götürecek ha? Hah!
english: He's going to take the next guy?

text: İkisi Moğol'a karşı savaştılar. İkisi pusat arkadaşı.
english: Two of them fought against the Mongols, two of them were center friends.

text: Ana, kardeşim kendi ağzıyla itiraf etse bile ben inanmam.
english: Mother, even if my brother confesses it, I won't believe it.

text: Belli ki ona bir tuzak kurdular.
Bu tuzak sadece ona değil, hepimize kuruldu.
english: This trap is not just for him, it's for all of us.

text: Bu tuzağı kuran da Moğol'un ta kendi.
english: The Mongol is the one who set this trap.

text: Dediğin doğruysa Moğol'un o kırılasıca eli...
english: If what you say is true, that fragile hand of the Mongol...
Is what we're hearing true, Ma?
...to the man who was left alone by his chamberlords...

text: ...şimdi de sarayın çakalları mı pençe geçirmek istermiş?
english: ...and now he wants to punch the palace jackals?
What do you know, Halime Sultan?

text: Bildiğim tek şey şu Gündoğdu Bey...
english: All I know is that Mr. Sunrise...

text: ...yiğidimi kılıç tutamaz eliyle kurda kuşa yem ettiniz.
english: ...you have fed my strength to the wolf with your hand that cannot hold the sword.
You threw him in front of Noyan.

text: (Artuk iç ses) Devletler kurup devletler yıkanlara.
english: (Laughter) The ones who build states and wash states.

text: (Artuk iç ses) Vazifeli Artuk'tan selamlar olsun.
(Artuk iç ses) Dodurga Obasında işler iyice karıştı.
english: (Laughter) Things are very messy in the Doddurga Room.

text: (Artuk iç ses) Ertuğrul, Ertokuş'un katliyle suçlanır.
english: (Inner voice) Ertuğrul is accused of killing Ertuğrul.

text: (Artuk iç ses) Gören gözünüz Artuk der ki; Ertuğrul masumdur.
english: (Shouting) Your eye will say, "Erthugul is innocent".

text: (Artuk iç ses) Ne vakit emir buyurursanız vazife icra edilecektir.
english: (Aloud) When you give a command, it is done.
Come on, honey, it's time to fly.
I'm going to get some weed.

text: Gündoğdu Bey bizim için çok önemli. Onu yanımıza çekmeliyiz.
english: Mr. Sunrise is very important to us.

text: Sakın ola ki onu kırmayasın ağabey.
...Gündoğdu, sahip olabileceğin en iyi damattır abi.
english: ...the sunrise is the best wedding you can have, bro.

text: Doğrucu Davut birine benzer. Ya ileride ayağımıza dolanırsa?
english: The righteous David looks like someone, but what if he walks on our feet?

text: Goncagül gibi güzeller güzeli bir genç kıza...
english: A beautiful young girl like Goncagul...

text: Ben de halam gibi düşünürüm babacığım.
english: I think like my aunt, Dad.

text: Uç beyliğini aldığımızda senin en yakınındaki yiğitlerden biri olacaktır.
english: When we get the captaincy, he'll be one of the heroes closest to you.

text: O askerin sözlerine ne kadar itibar edilir Gümüştekin?
english: How much credit is given to the words of that soldier with the silver?

text: Ertuğrul böyle bir şey yapmaz. Sen de bilirsin.
english: Ertuğrul doesn't do that, and you know it.
I just want to see with my own eyes...

text: ...bir de Saadettin Köpek'in mührünü bastığı devletin emrine itibar ederim beyim.
english: ...and I respect the government's order to seal the Saadettin Dog, sir.
I said, "Let's be one against the enemy".
I've taken a step away from myself.
It's not like being a genius.
The point is to have one heart.

text: Yüreğimiz kanarken bu nasıl olacak peki?
english: How can we do that when our hearts are bleeding?
If we don't find Ertuğrul and solve this...

text: ...oba da, otağımız da başımıza yıkılır ana.

english: I'm going to take care of it.

text: Hiçbir yerde yoktur. Atını da alıp gitmiş.

english: What are you doing here, Halime?

text: Seninle konuşmuştuk. Buraya gelmeyecektin. Çok tehlikeli burası.
english: We talked to you, you weren't supposed to come here.

text: Selçuklu Devleti hakkında ferman çıkardı Ertuğrul.
english: He issued a decree on the Seljuk State, Ertuğrul.
It's the brother of Aitolun Khatun, Silverekin.

text: (Gündoğdu) Gümüştekin, seninle iki kelam konuşmak isterim.
english: (Easter) With silver, I'd like to talk to you about two words.
It was sunrise, sunrise, I know you're mad at me.

text: Rahmetli babanı da, Ertuğrul kardeşini de çok iyi tanırım.
english: I know your father and your brother Ertuğrul very well.
I'd like it, I'd count it.

text: Oğuz'a nasıl güç kattıklarına her vesileyle şahit olmuşluğum vardır.
english: I have witnessed in every instance how they have strengthened the Son.

text: (Gündoğdu) O vakit benim kardeşimin bu işte bir payı olmadığını da bilmen icap eder.
english: Then you'll know that my brother has no part in this.
(Silver) I want to believe that with all my heart.

text: Duyduğumdan beri Allah'a bunun böyle olmaması için dua ederim.
english: I've been praying to God since the day I heard about it that it doesn't happen like this.

text: Gümüştekin, benim kardeşim masumdur ve ben bunu ispat edeceğim.
english: With the silver, my brother is innocent, and I will prove it.

text: Mahkeme edilmeden Ertuğrul infaz edilmez. Edilemez.
english: Ertugrul will not be executed without trial.
Our state is not a pillage.

text: Lakin teslim olmaz, dağlarda dolanırsa askerlerin eline düşer.
english: But if he doesn't surrender, he'll fall into the hands of the soldiers.

text: O vakit elimden bir şey gelmez.
(Gümüştekin) Onun ağabeyi olarak üzerine düşeni yap.
english: (Siliver) do what is right for him as his brother.
Bring him in, let's judge him.
A finger cut off by the ceremony doesn't hurt.
I'm going to get my innocence back.

text: Şimdi ağabeylik yapmanın tam vaktidir Gündoğdu.
english: Now is the time to be a brother, Sunrise.
Bring him in, bring him to justice.
What are we going to do now, Ertuğrul?

text: Girdiğimiz bu batağın içinden nasıl çıkacağız?
english: How are we going to get out of this swamp we're in?
Don't worry about it, Halime Sultan.
My Lord is the greatest of the disbelievers.
He works against every event, Ertuğrul.

text: Daha Moğol belası bitmeden şimdi de Selçuklu askerini öldürmekle suçlanırsın.
english: You're accused of killing your Seljuk soldier before the Mongol misery is over.

text: Ben bu yola baş koyduğumdan beridir...
english: I've been on this road since...
...the enemy will not leave my side, Halime Sultan.

text: ...ben de onların Azrail’i olmaya devam edeceğim.
english: ...and I will continue to be their Israelite.
I mean, the stress, the fear...
...and it's not right for us to fall.

text: Hadi sen obana dönesin. Benimle görüştüğünü kimseye söylemeyesin.
english: Come on, you go back to your apartment, don't tell anyone you're seeing me.

text: Obada hain vardır. Herkes gözünü dört açsın.
english: There's a traitor in the room, everybody keep an eye out.

text: Gerçeğin ortaya çıkması için elimden geleni yapacağım Ertuğrul.
english: I will do my best to bring out the truth, Ertuğrul.

text: Lakin sen de girdiğin bu savaşta beni kendinden uzak tutma, olur mu?
english: But don't keep me away from you in this war you're in, okay?

text: Kaderimizde şehit olmak varsa beraber olalım.
english: If we are to be martyrs, let us be together.

text: Bu dünyada ayrı kalırız. Bari öte dünyada kavuşalım.
english: We'll be apart in this world, but at least we'll meet in the next.
The separation has grown the love of Halime Sultan.
Fate is in love with effort.

text: Biz gayret edeceğiz ki düşmanlarımız diz çökecek.
english: We will strive so that our enemies will kneel down.

text: Biz gayret edeceğiz ki tuzaklar bozulacak.
english: We'll make sure the traps are broken.

text: Biz gayret edeceğiz ki adalet yerini bulacak.
english: We will strive to ensure justice is served.

text: Beceriksiz! Nasıl kaçırırsın elinden o iti?
english: How can you take that dog out of his hand?

text: Alpleri okçularıyla önümüze çıktı. Ben de yaralandım.
english: The Alps came forward with their archers, and I was wounded.

text: Niye gebermedin de yanıma geldin ha?
english: Why didn't you die and come to me?
You finally fell into my hands, Atabey Ertoush.
(Goncagul) Mr. Sunrise, I read the order.
The order says he's gonna get caught first.
...if you're going to kill someone, I'm the author.
I know, I talked to your dad.

text: ...babam ömrünü devletine ve Oğuzların birliğine adamıştır.
english: ...my father has dedicated his life to the state and the Union of the Sons.

text: Ne Ertuğrul Bey'e, ne de Kayılara karşı adaletten asla ayrılmayacaktır.
english: He will never leave justice to Ertuğrul Bey or the Qays.

text: Bu meseleyi en adil şekilde çözecek tek kişi odur.
english: He's the only one who can solve this issue fairly.
Otherwise, none of us know what's going to happen.

text: Bütün kalbimle Ertuğrul Bey'in masum olduğuna inandığımı bilesin, olur mu?
english: You know I believe with all my heart that Mr. Ertuğrul is innocent, okay?
For some reason, I have a voice inside me...

text: Halime Sultan, eğer kardeşimi bu beladan kurtarmamı istersen...
english: Halime Sultan, if you want me to save my brother from this trouble...
...it's inventive to tell you where he is.

text: Halime, eğer Ertuğrul'u bulamazsak bu iş çığırından çıkar.
english: Halime, if we don't find Ertuğrul, this is gonna be over.

text: Söyle ki gidip onunla konuşayım. Bir hal çaresine bakalım.
english: Tell him I'll go talk to him and we'll figure it out.
No, you know, if you don't tell me...

text: ...onu kendi ellerinle dar ağacına gönderirsin, bilmiş ol.
english: ...you send him to the narrow tree with your own hands, you know.

text: Onu kör kuyulara atmadan evvel düşünecektiniz bunları.
english: You should have thought of that before you threw him into the blind wells.

text: Nerede diye merak ederseniz, obasını sadece Noyan'dan değil...
english: If you're wondering where, the village is not just from Noyan...

text: ...sizin de hatalarınızdan korumak için her yerdedir.
english: ...is everywhere to protect you from your mistakes.

text: Her ağacın kovuğunda, her taşın altında.
english: Under every tree, under every rock.

text: Ertuğrul yaşadığı müddetçe Kayı Obası için umut var demektir.
english: As long as Ertugrul lives, there's hope for the House of the Squirrel.

text: Ne vakit onun başına bir hal gelir...
english: When does something happen to him...

text: ...o vakit umut da biter Gündoğdu Bey'im.
english: ...then all hope is gone, my Lord Sunrise.
I'm going to find my brother.
What did you talk to Silverstein about?
That a court will be established...
...and he said he would prove Ertuğrul innocent.
What kind of justice is that?

text: Gündoğdu, hâlâ karşıma geçmiş adaletten bahsediyorsun.
english: It's sunrise, and you're still talking about the justice I've been through.

text: Artık o da sizin bir savaşçınız olmayı hak etmiştir.
english: He deserves to be a fighter for you.

text: Sen de beyin Gündoğdu gibi uyanık değilsin.
english: You're not as awake as the brain is.

text: Ama yine de Abdurrahman güvendiğim adamları bir bir cebinden çıkardı.
english: But still, Abdurrahman took the men I trusted out of a pocket.
One jump on the cheek, two jumps.
You fell into my arms on the third.

text: Ak sakallıların Ögeday'ın yanına soktuğu casusu artık bilirim.
english: I know the spy the white bearded put in with Oegaday.

text: Cehenneme kadar yolun var aşağılık yılan.
english: You've got a way to hell, you bastard snake.

text: Ögeday, Sungur Tekin'in kellesini bana bal mumunda yollayacak.
english: Ogeday will send Sungur Tekin's head to me in a honeycomb.

text: Sungur Tekin'in kellesini obalarının girişine asacağım.
english: I'm going to hang Sungur Tekin's head at the entrance to his village.

text: Çürümüş bir kelle işime yaramaz diye düşündüm.
english: I thought a rotten head was no use to me.

text: Anası ve kardeşleri Sungur Tekin'in kellesini görür görmez tanısınlar isterim.
english: I want you to know his mother and his brothers as soon as you see Sungur Tekin's head.
You'll never get what you want from me.

text: Ne Sungur Tekin'i, ne de Selçuklu Ordusu'nun savaş planlarını.
english: Neither Sungur Tekin nor the Seljuk Army's war plans.
I already got what I wanted, Red Bull.

text: Sultan Alaeddin, şanlı komutanının elimizde olduğunu öğrenince...
english: When Sultan Alaeddin learned that we had his glorious commander...
What do you think he'll think?
He'll think he's lost the war before the war starts.

text: Gündoğdu sözlerime ikna oldu. Onun sayesinde Ertuğrul'a ulaşacağım.
english: The sunrise convinced me that I will reach Ertuğrul.
The Eagle will find what he deserves.

text: Sen benim oğlumdan ne istersin? Derdin ne senin?
english: What do you want from my son?

- Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey

text: Beni iyi dinle abi. Sen de Gümüştekin.
english: Listen to me, brother, you're also a Silver.

text: Bu cinayetlerin müsebbibi benim oğlum değildir.
english: My son is not responsible for these murders.

text: Bunu onun ağzından duymadan ne sizin söylediklerinize...
english: What you're saying is that you're not gonna hear it from her...

text: ...ne de emirde yazılanların tekine bile inanmam.
english: ...and I don't believe anything in the order.

text: ...eğer obamdaki beylerin, ahalinin ağzından laf almak için zulmederseniz...
english: ...if you harass the gentlemen of my ward to get a word from their family...

text: Bin yıldır içimizde ve dışımızdaki düşmanlara nasıl direndiysek...
english: How we have resisted enemies inside and outside us for a thousand years...

text: ...bu karda kışta Yecüc'le Mecüc'ün ordularına da öyle direniriz.
english: ...we will resist Yejuj and Mejuj's armies in this winter of snow.
I have orders from the Crusader State.
If the government is in charge, the mountains are ours.

text: O Saadettin Köpek denilen adama böyle söylersiniz.
english: That's what you call a guy named Saadett's Dog.

text: (Tuğtekin) Nasıl bir düğün istersin güzel gözlüm?
english: (Sniffing) What kind of wedding would you like, pretty girl?
What do you mean, "I'm not a doctor"?

text: Bir hatun düğününü hayal etmez mi hiç?
english: Does a girl ever imagine a wedding?

text: O zaman bir an evvel edesin.
english: Then you can take a moment.

text: Hazırlıklara hemen başlamak gerek. Civardaki bütün boy beyleri gelecek.
english: We need to get ready now, all the big gentlemen in the neighborhood are coming.
I'm going to ask you something.
What's the matter with you, Skywalker?

text: Ben sana ne derim, sen bana ne sorarsın!
english: What shall I tell you, what shall you ask me?

text: Bilirsin, Ertuğrul benim çocukluğumdan beri büyüdüğüm ağabeyimdir.
english: You know, Ertuğrul is my older brother since I was a kid.

text: Bundan gayrı Ertuğrul'u merak dahi edemezsin.
english: You can't even be curious about Ertuğrul.
(Tagging) I hope the brick doesn't hurt the sky.

text: Bu evlilik de obaya huzur getirir inşallah.
english: I hope this marriage brings peace to the village.

text: İnşallah beyim. Lakin Tuğtekin'de bu hırs olduğu müddetçe...
english: I hope so, but as long as Tuğtekin has this ambition...
- I'm not going to be able to get you out of here.

text: Başardım beyim. Noyan itinin gözünde itibar kazandım.
english: I've earned the reputation of the Noyan dog.

text: ...gözlerimin önünde Selçuklu askerlerini şehit ettiler beyim.
english: ...they have martyred their Seljuk soldiers before my eyes, sir.

text: En zor görevi sana vermiştim Abdurrahman.
english: I gave you the most difficult task, Abdurrahman.
If you can get out of this mission...
...you can save thousands of Alpine lives.
Hamza and I delivered them to Noyan.

text: Yarın Ögeday'a götürmek için yola çıkacaklar.
english: They're leaving tomorrow to take him to Ogeday.

text: Hemen dön Abdurrahman. Eğer yokluğunu hissederlerse şüphelenebilirler.
english: If they feel your absence, they may suspect.
There's one more thing, my lord.
They found out he was a spy.
They sent a message to O'Day.

text: Sungur Tekin mi? Neler olur beyim?
Hazırlanın Alpler. Ertokuş Bey'i almaya gidiyoruz.
english: Get ready, Alps, we're going to pick up Mr. Tomorrow.
(He is the one who is born)
(He is the One who is born)
(Erthog) Again, it was just in time, Mr. Ertuğrul.

text: Evelallah. Noyan tahmin ettiğimizden daha kudretlidir.
english: Noah is more powerful than we thought.

text: Düşmanımız kudretli olsun ki yiğitliğimiz meydana çıksın.
english: May our enemy be strong, so that our might may be manifested.
